name: Introduction to Engineering
description: Overview of the basic principles of engineering, including topics such as design, materials, and safety.

name: Engineering Mathematics
description: Introduction to the mathematical concepts and techniques used in engineering, including topics such as calculus, linear algebra, and probability.

name: Engineering Mechanics
description: Overview of the principles of mechanics, including topics such as statics, dynamics, and vibrations.

name: Introduction to Systems Engineering
description: Overview of the principles of systems engineering, including topics such as systems analysis and design.

name: Systems Analysis and Design
description: Detailed study of the processes involved in systems engineering, including topics such as requirements engineering and system architecture.

name: Systems Integration and Verification
description: Overview of the processes involved in systems engineering, including topics such as system testing and system deployment.
